dialog.naturalness: Rate the response on a scale of 0 to 1 on the quality of sounding natural. Give a high score if the response seems like something a person would naturally say
dialog.coherence: Rate the response on a scale of 0 to 1 on coherence. A response is coherent if it serves as a valid continuation of the preceding conversation. Coherent responses should receive high scores
dialog.engagingness: Rate the response on a scale of 0 to 1 on engagingness. The score should be low if the response is dull and uninteresting. The score should be high if the response is interesting or presents an interesting fact
dialog.groundedness: Rate the response on a scale of 0 to 1 on groundedness. Given the fact that this response is conditioned on, it should get a high score if the response uses that fact
dialog.understandability: Rate the response on a scale of 0 to 1 on understandability. Give a high score if the response is understandable given the previous context

summarization.coherence: Rate the summary of given text on a scale from 0 to 1 on coherence, with a higher value corresponding to higher coherence. Coherence is a collective quality of all sentences. To score highly on it, the summary should be well-structured and well-organized. It should not just be a heap of related information, but should build from sentence to sentence to form a coherent body of information about the topic.
summarization.consistency: Consistency measures whether the details in the summary reproduce the facts present in the text accurately. Rate the summary of given text on a scale from 0 to 1 on consistency.
summarization.fluency: Fluency measures the quality of individual sentences, and whether they are well-written and grammatically correct. Rate the summary of a given text on a scale of 0 to 1 on fluency
summarization.relevance: Relevance is the quality of a summary to capture important information from a reference text. Rate the summary on a scale from 0 to 1 on relevance
